subject.value: Your account activation has been completed

body.value:
{appInfo.name}
 Helping People buy Businesses

 

Hi {c_firstname},

We received your acknowledgement of receipt of your copy of our Buyer's Registration,  NDA and commission agreement.  I want to welcome you to {appInfo.name} Online Business Database.  Your account has been activated in our system and you now have the ability to log in to {appInfo.name}'s web site.

This is your user name and password to your online account.
 

User Name: {c_email}
Password: {c_password} 

You can login to your account by going to www.YBB.com

Here is a brief operational overview of your online Portfolio System: When you log in to your online account for the first time, you will see a brief, line-item description of your original
request.  Just Click on the Listing ID, or Business Title, to see the financial details and full 
description of the business.

 I am available to assist you anytime with your business search.  In the meantime, if you need to get in touch with me, please feel free to do so using the contact information below.  


Regards,

 {c_broker.name}

{appInfo.name}
 

Phone: {c_broker.c_mobile}

Email: {c_broker.c_email}
